docs.snippet: Those hues of the Irish’s sneakers have streaked across basketball courts over the last two and a half weeks, offending traditionalists, clashing with the team’s gold jerseys and blinding viewers at home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Those hues of the Irish’s sneakers have streaked across basketball courts over the last two and a half weeks, offending traditionalists, clashing with the team’s gold jerseys and blinding viewers at home.
docs.abstract: Notre Dame basketball team, busy preparing for NCAA tournament round of 32 against Butler, has not lost a game since several players debuted new neon sneakers on March 4.

headline.main: Notre Dame Rides a Streak With Shoes Like Highlighters

docs.abstract: Brooklyn Nets defeat Milwaukee Bucks, 129-127, in three overtimes.
